thread.title: Cristiano Ronaldo posts shout-out to Justin Bieber on Instagram - and we're not entirely sure why
thread.title_full: Cristiano Ronaldo posts shout-out to Justin Bieber on Instagram - and we're not entirely sure why

author: Jake Polden
title: Cristiano Ronaldo posts shout-out to Justin Bieber on Instagram - and we're not entirely sure why
text:
Get Real Madrid CF updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Social media provides insight into the lives of celebrities. 
But it's not always clear exactly what it is they are flaunting/what is going on/why that has just taken place - for the latter, think back to the time Wayne Rooney tweeted Rio Ferdinand... 
In the above video Cristiano Ronaldo has a message for Justin Bieber, and apparently he wants the whole world to know it. 
That's great and all that, but the problem is it is quite hard to work out exactly what the message is... have a look for yourself and see if you can make heads or tail of it. "Hello, Mr Bieber!" (Photo: Instagram/cristiano) 
In the clip, the Real Madrid star says hello to "Mr Bieber" before suddenly introducing his friend, Colombian pop star J Balvin. 
Except he actually introduces him as a UN ambassador, before adding that he can sing too - oh, and finally, that he's also his pal. 
He then tells the pop star to "check it out", before sticking the camera in Balvin's face. We wonder what Justin Bieber will make of the message? (Photo: Getty) 
Addressing "Mr Bieber, not Justin Bieber" - presumably out of respect, or maybe he's talking to another Mr Bieber, honestly we're so confused at this point we don't know what is going on - he asks him how he is... he then shows off his watch... 
This is what Alexis Sanchez made of it. Like us on Facebook
